fields.name: Motorskills
fields.description: his Courses has been created to help children develop fine motor skills In the this course Children will receive a set of blocks and a booklet that has images of to create different structures,This course has been adapted for ages from 3-10 years so skills can be developed over a longer period of time.

fields.name: Saftey
fields.description: This Course was designed to help new families or educators understand the importance of saftey training.In this course you will be trained in first aid and how to handle situations that maybe life threating to ensure the saftey of the childern involved.

fields.name: Nutrition
fields.description: This is a simple guide into understanding why nutrition is important and how to create a simple yet effective way incorporate these aspects in everyday living for the childern and family.

fields.name: Diversity awareness
fields.description: This is a simple guide into understanding why how to help childern and families intergrate with one another. the topics that will be addressed are different cultures , approach to discipline and improving vocabulary with general society

fields.name: Saftey first and anything after
fields.description: speical on our saftey courses and any development programme after that for free
